reviewText: My children and I loved this movie. I'd love to buy a copy of it to show my grandchildren. I believe they would love it too.

I love this movie.  It is a touching story about nature and dedication to preservation with humor and warmth.  I can't find it anywhere.  I played this movie for my children, and now I would love to play it for my grandchildren.  If anyone knows where to get a copy, please let me know at mjs1217@sbcglobal.net
Saw this when I was a kid and now I want my kids to see it! Such an inspiring film and so memorable.

This is one of the very best videos I have ever seen. Stars Denver Pyle and Ken Berry. Has some of the sweetest baby animals ever filmed. It is historically about 90 per cent accurate!

Sincerely,
Dr. J. Barksdale Ph. D.,
Historian and Film Critic
